data.title: Hamlin Town Center
data.meta_description: Horizon West news and information for Orange County, FL's fastest growing community. Horizon West's largest source for news and development.
data.text:
Hamlin Town Center is the centerpiece for the Hamlin development, a massive residential and commercial project taking place in West Orange County and Horizon West. Led by Boyd Development, this development is bring much needed housing and commercial businesses to the area. Hamlin Town Center will feature an array of restaurants and shops that are easily accessible by walking paths to nearby neighborhoods. Once fully completed, the area will be very desirable to live in. A concept map for Hamlin is available online here.
